name: Escape_Tower
description:
Play as Princess Reponse tired of waiting for her prince and escape from your prison.

Avoid traps, jump over holes and use your magic hair to advance into the dungeon.

Controls :

ZQSD+ SPACE + mouse

Escape Tower is a one player game.

Escape tower is the first game I created. It's coded in javascript and it's supported by phaser and Tiled.
